headlines.description: Callum Wilson scored twice for Bournemouth as they enjoyed a 3-1 home victory over a defensively fragile Everton side.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson's double helps Bournemouth to defeat Ev

headlines.description: Arsenal let a two goal lead slip to draw 2-2 against Watford at Vicarage Road on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal give up two-goal lead in Watford draw
